description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Easter Eggs Chocolate Mug Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate Easter Eggs Chocolate Mug Cake
name: Chocolate Easter Eggs Chocolate Mug Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave on high for 70-90 seconds or until top is set and cake is just firm. Serve with cream.
